kds.routes package¶

Submodules¶

kds.routes.admin module¶

The admin route, nothing to see here.

kds.routes.admin.index()¶

kds.routes.main module¶

The main route.

kds.routes.main.get_locale()¶
kds.routes.main.get_timezone()¶
kds.routes.main.index()¶

Default table view - show the table and provide form and functions for modifying that table.

kds.routes.main.inject_css_on_error(form, css=' is-invalid')¶

Add a specific class to all form fields which have an error associated with it. The error comes from WTForms.

kds.routes.main.tablepage(tablename)¶

A generalized function for all data categories.

Module contents¶

Import all blueprints and register them.

kds.routes.init_app(app)¶

Register the blueprint. Used by the root __init__.

Parameters

app – The Flask app

Returns

None
